product_name: Patagonia All Weather Half-Zip Top - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia All Weather top matches perfectly with early morning runs, cool-weather training and late-season activity. Quick-drying and moisture-wicking polyester fabric is ideal for exercise; mesh back and underarm panels enhance breathability. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay. Reflective zipper offers on-the-fly ventilation; collar protects neck from drafts. Low-profile thumbholes keep wrists warm. Reflective logo back enhances visibility. Offset seams reduce chafing. The Patagonia All Weather top offers a slim fit.
short_description: The Patagonia All Weather top matches perfectly with early morning runs, cool-weather training and late-season activity.
